website_summaries.verdict: Easily the best wax comb available, the Wax Buddy IV’s multiple sides make it easier than ever to scrape and comb every inch of your surfboard.
pros: 3 different scraping surfaces for extra versatility
cons: Relatively expensive for a wax comb, but it’s well-worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wax Comb/Scraper
customer_reviews.text: This wax comb and scraper is excellent. Is is the right size and shape. Others I've used force you to grab the comb on the sharp or serrated side, the SBS comb has a useful handle (in more ways than one with the bottle opener). The texture of the comb is just right, sharp enough to work, but not sharp enough to damage your board. The curved scraper edge allows you to get those little bits of wax that seem to migrate from the deck of the board onto the rails. All in all, it works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Shady

product_meta.title: Santa Barbara Surfing SBS Surf Wax Comb & Scraper with Bottle Opener - Wax Buddy IV for SBS
product_meta.description: Santa Barbara Surfing teamed up with Wax Buddy to bring you this SBS branded Wax Buddy IV, the first of it's kind that offers a built in bottle opener in addition to an already incredible wax comb that scrapes and combs your wax in half the time and with incredible comfort. Surf in some hardcore conditions: Not only does it double as a bottle opener, it triples as a windshield ice scraper. It's got your back!
feature_bullets: TWICE AS FAST: Remove wax in half the time with a an ergonomic handle that provides incredible leverage.
INNOVATIVE BOTTLE OPENER: World's only wax comb that has a built in bottle opener for that beer or bottle of soda.
3 SIDED VERSATILITY: A flat scraper for most of board, a concave edge for rails, and a comb for forming wax to create great traction. Also works as a windshield ice scraper.
BEST IN CLASS COMFORT: The handle is not only strong but allows to comfortably grip the wax comb to scrape wax off for days on end.
DOUBLE BARREL WAX: Brought to you by the same people who make Double Barrel Surf Wax, but works on Mr. Zogs Sex Wax, Sticky Bumps, and Others
